products.title: Devon Whisper White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Devon Whisper White 89mm Vertical Blind in White. Made to measure from £14.40 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Taking influence from soft cloth fabric weaves, our Devon range of vertical blinds provide a stunning textured finish for your window dressing. Whisper white is a stylish, soft white shade. Contemporary and modern this will be a welcome addition to home interiors.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1408 Fabric Colour: Whisper White Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Devon Sandstone 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Devon Sandstone 89mm Vertical Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £14.40 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Taking influence from soft cloth fabric weaves, our Devon range of vertical blinds provide a stunning textured finish for your window dressing. Sand will introduce a stylish, earthy shade into your interiors. A fabulously warm grey/brown hue.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB1407 Fabric Colour: Sandstone Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Devon Shadow Grey 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Devon Shadow Grey 89mm Vertical Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £14.54 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Devon, a beautiful, soft and sophisticated pattern,  which gives your home a warm feeling. A great addition.This grey vertical blind is ideal to add some effortless chic to any room in your home without breaking the bank.
 
 Product ID: SDB-VTB0945 Fabric Colour: Shadow Grey Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Devon Shadow
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Devon Shadow Standard Vertical Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Vertical Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 500mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Fabric Composition: Polyester
 	Louvre Width: 89mm
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Fittings: Included
 	Controls: Cord control to open and close blind coordinated with headrail colour, chrome chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right.
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Louvres: Louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
